posts.content_html:
Product announcements, news, community spotlights, and other updates from Roblox Staff.

Who can post here?

  • Only Roblox staff members can create topics in this category.
  • All Members of the forum can reply to the topics in this category.
  • Everyone can read all the contents in this category, even when not logged in.

Want to contribute to the discussion?

See this post for more information on how to contribute.
